Set your own model

user-defined-recipies.Rmd

TiDML with User-defined Recipies 

library(tiDML)

fit <- dml_rf(
  mtcars,
  y = "mpg",
  d = "am",
  x = c("cyl", "disp", "hp", "drat", "wt", "qsec", "vs", "gear", "carb"),
) 
#> Warning in make_folds_stratified(data, d = d_name, v = v): `d` is not
#> binary-like; returning unstratified folds.

print(fit)
